ygData.subject: Re: How Much?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, I should have a good bit to buy the ones I want.  I have 85pp as of now and I m still on Lvl 15, I m still beating up on Mino s in Steamfont and some
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, I should have a good bit to buy the ones I want. I have 85pp as of
now and I'm still on Lvl 15, I'm still beating up on Mino's in Steamfont and
some con green to me (thats why it's taking me forever to Lvl), but they
still give me exp but some are blue and say they are risky to me. It helps
beating them and them having an axe on them. Yesterday I think I ended up
with like six or more axe's, which helped me out a good bit for my Lvl 19
spells once I get there.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
>
> 9.5-11 pp per spell :(
>
> I know because I just spent all my cash on spells and I am still missing
> some damn it .... ahhh welll
>
> Jaxim (the poor ass bastard)
>
>
>
> >From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] How Much?
> >Date: Sat, 3 Jul 1999 11:39:26 -0400
> >
> >From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> >How much or most of the Lvl 19 cleric spells? I think I have over 25pp
> >right now, so by 19 I hope to have over 50pp or more cause I never buy
> >anything, I make my own food and drink so I don't have to spend a cp on
> >that
> >and I sell anything I loot unless it's good enough for me to use. Right
> >now
> >I have like 5 Mino Axe's to sell so that'll help me out a good bit.
> >
